name: Crystal Runner
description:
Zoom through a dark landscape on a hovercraft, avoid obstacles, collect glowing gems, grab speed boosts from energy crystals, hide in the shadows, and evade the deadly watcher in this stealthy, high speed, dark scifi/fantasy game prototype.

Yes, it's very incomplete. More of just a toy at the moment. I wanted to share it before I worried too much about every last detail. Please try it out and share your feedback.
